comment: Best professor I've ever had. Always in a great mood, very loving and helpful. Responds to emails quick. PLEASE sign up for her classes.

Dr. Aleksandra does really care for her students. The course includes easy weekly vocabulary quizzes and simple tests, especially the listening section with subtitles. You can email her with questions and usually get a response within an hour. Her support fosters a positive learning environment, helping you feel confident in the class.

She is one of my most favorite professors. She has such a big heart and actually wants to see her students thrive. She always helped me with anything I needed and made sure that every assignment was intentional and engaging. I wish I could have her again! Definitely recommend her as someone who never took German ever and actually learned a lot.

She creates a really comfortable class environment and legitimately wants you to succeed. I really wish she taught every level of German. If you do your homework and participate in class you will have no problem making an A.

Frau Starcevic is really one of a kind. Her expectations are clear, and she will always go out of her way to help you out. There is no excuse to perform poorly on the tests, as her teaching methods and test reviews allow no room for ambiguity come test day. Do the homework and FLRC hours, study, and you will be successful in her class.

You will not regret this teacher, some may say she spoon feeds you test but strangely the way she does it, makes her test unstressful but still a good measure of you needing to study. I knew what to expect and knew what to study. I wish she could teach all my classes.
Great class with an amazing professor. She was always there for us, and you can tell that she absolutely loves teaching.

The semester is almost over and I never thought I wish it wasn't. She is one of the best teachers I have ever had. She made sure that every class is entertaining and created such an environment that everyone felt comfortable participating. I will miss this class. I wish she was teaching 1002. Take her! You will not regret it!

Absolutely love this professor. You can always rely on her helping. The study guides are great. She always make sure all of us ready for any assignments and tests. Extremely pleasant and entertaining.

One of the best teachers I have @ KSU. She really cares about what she teaches as well as for her students. Makes class very entertaining. If you decide to take German, take her classes. You will not regret it.

Very helpful and nice. She is funny and knows how to make learning fun and easy. Tests come straight from the study guides and she gives a lot of hints. Pay attention, do the work and you will get an A and learn German :)
One of the best professors I have ever had. She is very nice and helpful. You'll love her. She makes learning fun.
